text:
#3ThingstoKnow for #Tuesday!

1⃣ #ConsumerPrices increased 0.6% in #March. #Inflation climbed 2.6% in the last year. 

2⃣ #UnitedStates advised a pause in the #JohnsonandJohnson #COVID19 #vaccine. 

3⃣ #PresidentBiden has decided to withdraw troops from #Afghanistan by #Sept11. https://t.co/fqYeRyHCIz
